resources.string:
1、If the random package name of Magisk is enabled, add it to the whitelist. Otherwise, hidden apps cannot obtain Root permission
2、Make sure to restart the mobile phone after upgrading from the old version; otherwise, the function will be invalid
3、On this page, you can hold down the icon to set "Connected Apps". "Connected Apps" and the app configured in this method are not hidden from each other
4、Hiding the system apps may cause the system to fail to boot
Setting up for \'%s\',the Connected Apps and \'%s\' are mutually visible.
Hide the app in another space.
The module does not take effect
The module does not take effect, you may need to: \n1. Activate this module;\n2. Restart the System.
Don\'t forget to whitelist Magisk (if it has random package names enabled)
Failed to get Apps, please grant permission.
If checked, it means that it needs to be hidden
This configuration takes effect after restarting the phone system
Are you sure to restart the system？
\'%s\' has been blinded. After adding to the whitelist, the blinding will be canceled. Are you sure you want to do this?
\'%s\' has been added to the whitelist, and will be removed from the whitelist after being blinded. Are you sure you want to do this?
